issue.message: The current server URL '/v1.33' is a relative path and lacks flexibility. It needs to be updated to a full URL with variables to support different n8n instance domains and API versions.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the URL of the first server entry from '/v1.33' to 'https://{your-n8n-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' and added corresponding variable definitions for 'your-n8n-instance-domain' (default: 'your-instance.n8n.cloud') and 'api-version-number' (default: '1.33') to allow for dynamic configuration.
